column1: 22048,X-Men: Manifest Destiny (2008) #1,1,49248,40,"Witness the biggest shake-up in X-Men history.  With the mansion in Westchester destroyed, the X-Men are moving to San Francisco.  But it's not just a change in the zip code.  Come see what the momentous change in status quo means to the X-Men.  In every issue of MANIFEST DESTINY Mike Carey (X-MEN, ENDANGERED SPECIES) brings you an installment of a story featuring one the first X-Men-Iceman.  Also in this first issue are stories by C.B. Cebulski (X-MEN:DIVIDED WE STAND, LONERS) and Skottie Young (X-MEN:DIVIDED WE STAND, NEW X-MEN).  ,2008,9
